metadata.synopsis: Dialog for Avery Sonshal, tadpoled proprietor of Felogyr's Fireworks. Sells harmless fireworks, alchemical supplies, and maybe some grenades. Helpful to the players if he recognizes them as also tadpoled.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Avery Sonshal on the ground floor of Felogyr's Fireworks in CTY_Main_A at about 0, 16, -127

42.speaker: Avery Sonshal
42.text: You again. What do you want?
42.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

71.speaker: Player
71.text: I'm here to see Uncle Felogyr.

67.speaker: Avery Sonshal
67.text: He's upstairs. Only one floor up, mind.

80.speaker: Avery Sonshal
80.text: Faces. Hands. And eyebrows. How do we protect them?
80.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

122.speaker: Willow
122.text: Watch for wind direction. Put on your gloves. Aaaaaand... alight at arm's length!
122.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

111.speaker: Avery Sonshal
111.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

32.speaker: Avery Sonshal
32.text: And what does Uncle Felogyr always say?
32.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

61.speaker: Willow
61.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

29.speaker: Avery Sonshal
29.text: Excellent! Now remember - Felogyr's Fireworks accepts no liability for singed nails, toasted eyelashes, loss of limbs, scalded torsos, or blown-off heads.
29.context: NodeContext: Uplifting, as if these weren't horrible side effects of having your face blown off by fireworks. Paced like a Terms and Conditions section of a radio ad.

116.speaker: Avery Sonshal
116.text: Now - you there. What can I do for you?

90.speaker: Avery Sonshal
90.text: *You feel an all-too-familiar squirm in the recesses of your mind. He has a tadpole.*

120.speaker: Narrator
120.text: *You feel an all-too-familiar squirm in the recesses of your mind. He has a tadpole.*

129.speaker: Avery Sonshal
129.text: A-ha! A fellow friend of Gortash! Praise the Absolute.

5.speaker: Avery Sonshal
5.text: I have a special sample, available just for you, if you wish.

46.speaker: Player
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: deathly serious

62.speaker: Avery Sonshal
62.text: This one will be very useful against any and all enemies of Gortash. Be sure to be clear of its explosion area.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: deathly serious

55.speaker: Avery Sonshal
55.text: Please enjoy responsibly! And nowhere near this establishment. Is there anything else I can do for you?
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: with an unexpected edge of intimidation

47.speaker: Player
47.text: What else do you do for Lord Gortash?
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: with an unexpected edge of intimidation

97.speaker: Avery Sonshal
97.text: What else? I don't know what you mean. We're purveyors of smokepowder.
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: with an unexpected edge of intimidation

9.speaker: Avery Sonshal
9.text: Anything that can be lit, flamed, or fired up! Smokepowder is a beautiful mistress, she will not be limited to one form, and she is quite malleable in the right hands.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: with an unexpected edge of intimidation

0.speaker: Avery Sonshal
0.text: What are you really asking, friend of Gortash?
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: with an unexpected edge of intimidation

18.speaker: Player
18.text: I'll take that free sample now, please.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Recall the merchant's password. 'Uncle Felogyr sent me.'

34.speaker: Avery Sonshal
34.text: A-ha! You must be Arfur's friend.

91.speaker: Avery Sonshal
91.context: NodeContext: a harsh whisper, NOT A MINMELD, spoken out loud

41.speaker: Avery Sonshal
41.text: Yes yes, he's just upstairs. But only one flight - if you get to the top, you've gone too far.
41.context: NodeContext: verbal equivalent of teasingly wagging a finger (and secretly meaning it when you're warning someone)

96.speaker: Avery Sonshal
96.text: (Browse as irresponsibly as you like. Just don't tell the other customers.)
96.context: NodeContext: whispered, just to the player, conspirationally

2.speaker: Player
2.text: What do you have for sale?

98.speaker: Avery Sonshal
98.text: Oh! Well why didn't you say so?

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Gortash sent me to check on your latest order.

114.speaker: Avery Sonshal
114.text: I see... Then he must not have received my update.

23.speaker: Avery Sonshal
23.text: I see... Then he must not have received my update.

83.speaker: Avery Sonshal
83.text: You may bring this message to him - everything is right on schedule. The next batch will be dispatched within a tenday.

8.speaker: Avery Sonshal
8.text: Exceptional quality, if I do say so myself. The Gondians will know it when they see it.

110.speaker: Avery Sonshal
110.text: I believe that concludes this purchase order. We very much appreciate Lord Gortash's continued honouring of our humble establishment with his custom.

25.text: He's done nothing of the kind. I have his latest order in my pocket. And he already has his update on its progress.

43.speaker: Avery Sonshal
43.text: He's done nothing of the kind. I have his latest order in my pocket. And he already has his update on its progress.

94.speaker: Avery Sonshal
94.text: I know this because I delivered it to him myself.

6.speaker: Avery Sonshal
6.text: Which begs the question - what business do you have masquerading as a servant of Lord Gortash?

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Just testing you. I'm interested in browsing your wares.

85.speaker: Avery Sonshal
85.text: I understand. We can't be too careful.

37.speaker: Avery Sonshal
37.text: Remember - once it's lit, you commit!

58.speaker: Avery Sonshal
58.text: Remember - once it's lit, you commit!

10.speaker: Avery Sonshal
10.text: And if it's not a firework - do whatever you like.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I was just being nosy. Sorry.

127.speaker: Avery Sonshal
127.text: Remember - face, hands, eyebrows. And once it's lit, you commit!
127.context: NodeContext: abruptly cheerful in sales patter mode

77.speaker: Player
77.text: Masquerading? Don't you recognise a servant of Gortash when you see one?

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Careful - my magic can be quite unpredictable, and I'd hate to see this place go up in flames.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: How DARE you? I am exactly who I proclaim to be!

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Question me again and your body will never be found.

40.speaker: Avery Sonshal
40.text: Sorry. Sorry sorry sorry! Please. Don't tell your master I doubted you.

131.speaker: Avery Sonshal
131.text: Sorry. Sorry sorry sorry! Please. Don't tell your master I doubted you.

117.speaker: Avery Sonshal
117.text: We value his custom immensely, and the services of all those in his employ!

81.speaker: Avery Sonshal
81.text: Please - take this. On the house.
81.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Off-screen: hands us an item. 
Mindmeld FX/no lipsync

109.speaker: Avery Sonshal
109.text: Er... please, enjoy the store. If there's anything I can help with, do not hesitate to ask.
109.context: NodeContext: a little quivery, afraid he misstepped

17.text: I don't know what kind of covert operative you are, but you are a threat to all that is good in this city.

22.speaker: Avery Sonshal
22.text: I don't know what kind of covert operative you are, but you are a threat to all that is good in this city.

16.speaker: Avery Sonshal
16.text: Now get out of my sight.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: viciously hissed

11.speaker: Avery Sonshal
11.text: And for gods' sakes have a little discretion.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: abruptly terse

112.speaker: Avery Sonshal
112.text: That is no answer at all.

78.text: That is no answer at all.

26.speaker: Avery Sonshal
26.text: That is no answer at all.

27.speaker: Avery Sonshal
27.text: If you are some sort of covert operative, you're a bad one.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Your latest order is late. Gortash demands to know why.

119.speaker: Avery Sonshal
119.text: Forgive me - I did not know I had kept Gortash's humble servant waiting.

69.speaker: Avery Sonshal
69.text: Forgive me - I did not know I had kept Gortash's humble servant waiting.

79.text: Has he, now? Then the latest update I sent did not arrive?

19.speaker: Avery Sonshal
19.text: Has he, now? Then the latest update I sent did not arrive?

30.speaker: Avery Sonshal
30.text: I assure you that is quite impossible. I delivered it myself.

64.speaker: Avery Sonshal
64.text: Tell me, what form will you have her in today?

104.speaker: Player
104.text: Whatever form best pleases Uncle Felogyr.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Let's see what you have in stock.

125.speaker: Player
125.text: Not in the mood for fireworks right now. Perhaps another time.

130.speaker: Avery Sonshal
130.text: Not a bother! Enjoy the shop.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Recall the password. 'Uncle Felogyr sent me'.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Can I see what you have for sale?

86.speaker: Player
86.text: No. I'll just be on my way.

101.speaker: Player
101.text: Is it really fireworks you sell to Gortash, or...?
101.context: NodeContext: conspirational and whimsical, like a verbal tap on the nose har har this is a lovely secret between us isn't it?

73.speaker: Avery Sonshal
73.text: Oh, we trade in all sorts.

7.speaker: Player
7.context: NodeContext: conspirational and whimsical, like a verbal tap on the nose har har this is a lovely secret between us isn't it?

3.speaker: Avery Sonshal
3.text: Heavens no! I'm just the humble proprietor. Avery Sonshal, at your service. Descendant of the great Felogyr Sonshal.
3.context: NodeContext: conspirational and whimsical, like a verbal tap on the nose har har this is a lovely secret between us isn't it?

100.speaker: Avery Sonshal
100.text: But you can call me Felogyr if you like. Helps spread the brand, see.
100.context: NodeContext: conspirational and whimsical, like a verbal tap on the nose har har this is a lovely secret between us isn't it?

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I'd like to see what you have for sale.

93.speaker: Avery Sonshal
93.text: Have you tried the Lantanese candles?

4.speaker: Avery Sonshal
4.text: Or perhaps the delicate simplicity of a perfectly crafted torch is more to your taste?

118.speaker: Player
118.text: I'm here to visit Uncle Felogyr. He sent me, if you catch my drift.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: You mentioned Gortash when we first met - do you work with him?

115.speaker: Avery Sonshal
115.text: Oh heavens, no, not with him. I work for him. As I do for all of my most loyal customers.

107.speaker: Avery Sonshal
107.text: Fabulously charismatic man though. Tips well.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I'm not sure yet. Can I see what you have for sale?
